description: Try our easy to follow Cajun Chicken Wings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken wings,Seafood free,Christmas,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dec 2019,Chicken,Sesame free,Budget,Peanut free
name: Cajun Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut and discard the tips from chicken, then cut through the joints.
Combine 1 cup buttermilk, paprika and 2 tsp sea salt flakes in a large bowl. Add chicken, stirring to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight if time permits.

Combine cornflour, flour, seasoning, 2 tsp sea salt flakes, 1/2 tsp ground black pepper and white pepper in a bowl. Remove chicken from buttermilk, allowing excess to drain off. Toss in flour mixture to coat and place onto baking paperlined tray.
Combine remaining buttermilk, yoghurt, most of the chives, and zest and juice of 1 lime.

Heat oil in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat. Cook chicken, in batches, for 6-8 minutes or until golden and cooked. Drain on a wire rack over a tray. Serve chicken with yoghurt sauce, remaining lime cut into wedges, remaining chives and chilli.
